alert.note: Alert for Kittson; Marshall (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 17 at 12:06PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Halstad affecting Traill and Norman Counties. Red River of the North at Oslo affecting Walsh, Polk, Grand Forks and Marshall Counties. Red River of the North at Drayton affecting Kittson, Pembina, Walsh and Marshall Counties. Red River of the North near Hickson affecting Cass County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Fargo affecting Clay and Cass Counties. Red River of the North at Wahpeton affecting Wilkin and Richland Counties. .Snowmelt river flooding to continue. Rate of rise and ultimate crest is uncertain due to rate of ongoing snowmelt runoff and possible rain and colder temperatures in the forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Drayton. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 38.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 21.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday and continue rising to 36.1 feet Monday. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 32.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
